snippet: The Wal-Mart truck driver from Georgia accused of triggering a crash in New Jersey that critically injured Tracy Morgan and killed another comedian had not slept for more than 24 hours.
lead_paragraph: The Wal-Mart truck driver from Georgia accused of triggering a crash in New Jersey that critically injured Tracy Morgan and killed another comedian had not slept for more than 24 hours.

headline.main: Prosecutor: Trucker in Morgan crash lacked sleep
headline.print_headline: Prosecutor: Trucker in Morgan crash lacked sleep
